name: TheBeatSacramento
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the beat sacramento
des: We have created a brand spanking new radio station that caters to the Old School music lovers who are passionately crazy about the dance music of the 70’s 80’s & 90’s. THE BEAT was designed to give our listeners a 24 hour, 7 day a week party experience featuring the best music that still lives on today. THE BEAT brings back the soulful sounds of the classics, plus the funky rhythms, rhymes and basslines of the dance club cuts, long versions and the original hip hop legends. It’s a soulful funky mix of the all time best R&B jams from back in the day. Tune in and take us wherever you go and let us take you back on a journey when the music was real and unforgettable. It’s the soundtrack of our lives. Welcome to the best R&B radio experience ever broadcasting from Sacramento California to the world!Enjoy! …and feel THE BEAT.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
